name: water-spout
caption: Water Spout

effect.short: Inflicts more damage when the user has more HP remaining, with a maximum of 150 power.
effect.full: Inflicts [regular damage]{mechanic:regular-damage}.  Power increases with the user's remaining [HP]{mechanic:hp} and is given by `150 * HP / max HP`, to a maximum of 150 when the user has full HP.

flavorText:
The user spouts water to damage opposing
Pokémon. The lower the user’s HP, the lower the
move’s power.
